content.p1: This is a platform for full-stack projects using Next.js. It provides an efficient framework for developing web applications with modern technologies. Key technologies include:
content.p2: Whether you're building your first application or managing complex projects, this platform offers the tools you need to get started quickly with minimal configuration.

nextjs.title: Next.js
nextjs.description: for server-side rendering and seamless development

tailwindCSS.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwindCSS.description: for customizable, responsive, and efficient styling

prisma.title: Prisma
prisma.description: for database management and ORM support, ensuring smooth data interaction

postgresql.title: PostgreSQL
postgresql.description: a powerful relational database for secure and scalable storage

shadcn.title: ShadCN
shadcn.description: a component library that simplifies creating cohesive and aesthetic user interfaces

lucideReact.title: Lucide React
lucideReact.description: A collection of open-source, customizable icons for React applications
